Story
A Beach Camp is a place for sailors, fishermen, traders and travelers to relax and replenish on the emerald coast‚Ä¶
Beach Camp‚Äôs Story:
Not long ago, our part of the Florida beach wasn‚Äôt so accommodating or easy to access. The area‚Äôs first visitors arrived by boat along the Gulf's coastline or traveled over 50 miles across the bay by ferry and through dense pine forests to reach our secret coast of the Gulf of Mexico.
Before tourists, only natives, fishermen, and coastal travelers knew of our special white sand beaches and rich fishing waters. These areas were understandably sparsely populated with year-round residents. However, they slowly began attracting visitors from all over during the season. The local beach camps grew and gathered to form little summer towns dotting the coast. Those towns eventually blossomed into the incredible beach destinations they are today.
Beach Camp was named to honor the humble beginnings of our little slice of paradise. Serving the slowed-down, coastal lifestyle with fresh, local inspirations - for residents and visitors alike.
About Our Beer
Welcome to the Beach Camp,
Pull your boat ashore and stay a while.
Our Brewpubs:
Serving local, fresh, Chef-inspired foods alongside the Best Beer on the Emerald Coast, and an impressive Island-themed cocktail program. Enjoy featured barbecue and seafood dishes inspired by our bountiful home on the beach.
Two locations in Historic beach towns: one in Grayton Beach, and the other on the Destin Harbor. Each brewing our original beer recipes, fresh, from top of the line systems innovated by our lead brewer.
